Content:
Ryan Hayden has served as pastor at Bible Baptist since November 2011. Prior to coming to Bible Baptist, Ryan served as a Christian school teacher, assistant pastor, and camp director at Fairview Baptist ministries in Athens, TN. Ryan is a graduate of Crown College, in Knoxville, TN and has been working towards a master degree from Pensacola Christian College. Ryan grew up in New Hampshire and northeast Virginia.

Pastor Hayden enjoys preaching expository messages and taking a hands on approach to children's ministry. He publishes a regular podcast called "The Foolishness of Preaching" where he interviews a pastor or preacher about their preaching. He often says his greatest privilege (besides his own family) is getting to serve the people at Bible Baptist.

Pastor Hayden is joined in the ministry by his wife Amanda and three children: Audrey (7), Molly (5) and Noah (3).

When not ministering, Pastor Hayden enjoys reading, blogging, cooking pizza in his outdoor pizza oven, designing websites and spending time with his family.

You can follow Pastor Hayden on twitter or facebook and read his blog and check out his design work at pastorryanhayden.com.

Adam McCaslin recently came on as the youth pastor at Bible Baptist. Brother Adam grew up in Northwest Georgia. He has degrees from both Crown College and Crown Seminar and has years of experience working in children's and youth ministry. Adam directs our youth group, our youth and children's Sunday School teachers, and our Patch the Pirate Club program.

Brother Harold Janssen serves as our song leader and as a deacon.  Harold and his wife Cindy have been members of Bible Baptist since the 1960s.  Harold has been a farmer, truck driver, and factory worker and is now retired in Trilla, IL.  He enjoys spending his time helping with construction projects around the church and camping with his family.
Brother Ernie lives in Gays, IL with his wife Jodi.  They have three grown children, all of whom live in Gays.

Brother Mark lives in Mattoon and has been a member of Bible Baptist since the 70s.  Mark directs our ushers at the church. He enjoys working on old cars, helping around the church, and spending time with his kids and grandkids.
Steve Pullen lives in Trilla with his wife Lynora.  Steve is a big help around the church and is in charge of our grounds and landscaping.
Cindy Janssen serves as our financial secretary.  She reconciles our spending with our budget and provides financial accountability.
Lynora Pullen faithfully orders Sunday School material and helps with Sunday School scheduling.  She also teaches a 1st-3rd grade Sunday School Class.
Many Overmyer, with her sister Charity, run our Children's Church program.  Mandy also directs our nursery.
